locationPrompt.title: Share Your Location
locationPrompt.description: Allow us to use your location to calculate accurate distances to game servers.

benefits.accuracy: Get more accurate distance estimates to servers
benefits.sorting: Sort servers by distance so you can find nearby servers
benefits.filtering: Filter servers by distance to only see servers within your preferred range

locationPrompt.privacy: Your location is only used for distance calculations and is never shared with third parties.
locationPrompt.fallback: If you choose not to share your precise location, we'll use an approximate location based on your IP address.

recommendations.title: Banner image recommendations:
recommendations.contentPlacement: Important content should be centered, as edges may be cropped on some displays

select.title: Step {step}: {action}
select.maxLimit: You can select up to {max} servers at a time.

server.name: Server Name
server.widgetDescription: You can embed this server widget on your website or forum:

players.allPlayersUnknown: All players are showing as "unknown". This is a common CS2 server issue.
players.installPlugin: Install the ServerListPlayersFix MetaMod plugin on your server.

dataExport.title: Data Export
dataExport.loginRequired: You need to be logged in to request your data.
dataExport.description: Request a copy of all data we have about you. It will be sent to your email address associated with your Steam account.
dataExport.emailRequired: Please provide an email address for data delivery.
dataExport.requestSubmitted: Your data export request has been submitted. You will receive an email when it's ready.
dataExport.requestFailed: Failed to submit data export request. Please try again later.
dataExport.emailDescription: We don't store your email in our database. This email will be saved locally on your device and used only for data export requests.
dataExport.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

filters.multiSelectTip: Use Ctrl + click to select multiple countries
filters.noCountriesFound: No countries found. Try adjusting your search.

noServers.title: No Servers Found
noServers.default: No servers are currently available. Please check back later.
noServers.withFilters: No servers match your current filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.
noServers.withRegion: No servers found in {region}. Try selecting a different region or location.

communities.slugHelp: A slug is a unique identifier used in the URL for your community (e.g., "my-community" in "cs2serverlist.com/community/my-community"). Only English letters, numbers, and hyphens allowed.
communities.noServersFound: No servers found for this community.
communities.noServersMatchFilters: No servers match your filter criteria. Try adjusting your search criteria.
communities.noOtherServersInCommunity: No other servers in this community.

info.mostPlayedMaps: Shows the most frequently played maps on this server and how often they appear in rotation
info.mapPlayerCounts: Compares average and peak player counts for each map to see which maps attract the most players
info.mapRotation: Visualizes the map rotation timeline, showing when maps change and how long each map is played

favorites.title: Your Favorites
favorites.favoriteServersWillAppear: Your favorite servers will appear here.

errors.failedToLoadServer: Failed to load server details. Please try again.
errors.noDataAvailable: No data available for this time period
errors.hostingProviderNotFoundDescription: The hosting provider you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.
errors.failedToLoadHostingProviderInformation: Failed to load hosting provider information
errors.failedToDeleteAllPlayerStats: Failed to delete all player stats
errors.fileSizeTooLarge: Image file size must be less than 5MB

welcome.title: Welcome to
welcome.description: The newest and most advanced destination for Counter Strike 2 community servers. Discover your next favorite server with our modern platform.
welcome.browseServers: Browse servers by popular game modes like
welcome.findAndConnect: Find and connect to the best CS2 servers worldwide.

app.disclaimer: This website is not affiliated with Valve Corporation. Some images are property of Valve Corporation.

auth.redirectNotice: You will be redirected to Steam to log in securely
auth.termsAgreement: By logging in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
auth.loginRequiredDescription: You need to login to access this page

hostings.title: Hosting Providers
hostings.noServersFound: No servers found for this hosting provider

profile.deleteMyDataDescription: This will permanently delete all your personal data from our systems.
profile.accountDeletedSuccess: Your account has been successfully deleted
profile.dataDeletedSuccess: Your data has been successfully deleted
profile.noServersYetDescription: You haven't added any servers to your profile yet.
profile.visibleOnMainPage: visible on the main page. Use the visibility toggle to control which servers appear on the main page.

discordIntegration.title: Discord Server Integration
discordIntegration.discordAccountRequiredDesc: To integrate your servers with Discord, you need to link your Discord account first.
discordIntegration.noBotAccessDesc: You need to invite our Discord bot to your servers to enable integrations.
discordIntegration.alreadyIntegrated: This server is already integrated with Discord in:
discordIntegration.selectNewServer: The current integration is no longer valid. Please select a new Discord server and channel:
discordIntegration.selectServerAndChannel: Select a Discord server and channel to integrate with {serverName}:
discordIntegration.thumbnailDesc: Small image next to the title
discordIntegration.bottomDesc: Larger image at the bottom of the embed
discordIntegration.noImageDesc: Text-only embed without any map image
discordIntegration.needTwoServers: You need at least 2 servers to create an embed
discordIntegration.embedInvalid: This embed is invalid or outdated
discordIntegration.deleteEmbedConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this embed? This action cannot be undone.
discordIntegration.connectDiscord: Connect your Discord account to create embeds
discordIntegration.noDiscordChannels: No channels found for this server
discordIntegration.fieldLimit: You can add up to 25 server fields per embed (Discord limit)
discordIntegration.offlineServerNote: Servers that are offline and have no players will receive updates less often to save resources.
discordIntegration.discordIntegrationDescription: Connect your servers to Discord channels for real-time updates.
discordIntegration.linkYourDiscordAccount: Link your Discord account for server integrations

serverControl.communityMediaInfo: When enabled, these servers will use your community's social media links on their details pages.
serverControl.displayOnMainList: Display this server on the main server list page
serverControl.reachedMainPageLimit: You've reached your limit of {max} servers visible on the main page. Hide another server first to make this one visible.
serverControl.countryDescription: Select the country where your server is located. This will override automatic detection.
serverControl.useCommunityMediaDesc: Use your community's social media links instead of server-specific links
serverControl.communityMediaLinksInfo: When enabled, this server will use your community's social media links on its details page. You can still set server-specific links below, but they will only be shown if you disable this option.
serverControl.communityNote: Note: If you add this server to your community, it will be visible to all members of the community.
serverControl.selectPrimaryGameMode: Select the primary game mode for this server
serverControl.bulkEditDescription: Bulk edit allows you to update multiple servers at once. Select up to 20 servers to edit, then choose which settings to update.
serverControl.bulkEditNote: Community assignment and country settings will be applied to all selected servers. IP addresses can be changed individually for each server.
serverControl.maxServersSelection: You can select up to 20 servers at a time for bulk editing.
serverControl.commonSettingsDescription: These settings will apply to all selected servers:
serverControl.ipWarningDescription: When updating IP addresses, the server must be online and reachable. Each IP will be verified and must follow the format ip:port (e.g., 127.0.0.1:27015). If port is omitted, default port 27015 will be used.
serverControl.assignToCommunityDescription: All servers will be assigned to or removed from your community
serverControl.visibilityInfo: Use the visibility toggle to control which servers appear on the main page and are included in rankings
serverControl.maximizePresence: To maximize your presence, add more servers to your community but keep only your best/most popular servers visible on the main page
serverControl.autoHideInfo: When adding new servers, they'll automatically be hidden from the main page if you've reached your limit

bulkEdit.title: Bulk Edit Servers
bulkEdit.description: Bulk edit allows you to update multiple servers at once. Select up to 20 servers to edit, then choose which settings to update.
bulkEdit.noteDescription: Community assignment and country settings will be applied to all selected servers. IP addresses can be changed individually for each server.

select.title: Step {step}: {action}
select.maxLimit: You can select up to {max} servers at a time.

communityControl.communityDisabledDescription: Your community has been disabled by an administrator. Contact support if you believe this is an error.
communityControl.noCommunityYet: You don't have a community yet. Create one to manage your servers together.
communityControl.slugHelp: A slug is a unique identifier used in the URL for your community (e.g., "my-community" in "cs2serverlist.com/community/my-community"). Only English letters, numbers, and hyphens allowed.
communityControl.formattingTips: Formatting tips for optimal display and SEO:
communityControl.firstLineTip: First line (20 characters): Use as a title or welcome message
communityControl.newLineTip: Start a new line after the title for the rest of your description
communityControl.previewCharactersTip: Only the first 100 characters will be shown in social media previews
communityControl.conciseTip: Be concise and descriptive for better engagement
communityControl.contentPlacementRecommendation: Important content should be centered, as edges may be cropped on some displays
communityControl.displayLocationInfo: The banner will be displayed at the top of your community page and in social media previews
communityControl.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your community? This action cannot be undone.

hostingControl.fetchError: Failed to load hosting provider data
hostingControl.websiteAdminOnly: Website can only be changed by administrators.
hostingControl.fixIpErrors: Please fix the errors in IP addresses

plugins.installOurOfficialPlugins: Install our official plugins to get real-time updates, player statistics tracking, and enhanced features for your servers.
plugins.betaFeature: This feature is still in beta and may not be 100% accurate.
plugins.betaFeatureDescription: If you are interesting of testing this feature out, please contact us.
plugins.playerStatsUpdatedSuccessfullyDescriptio: The player stats have been successfully updated.
plugins.playerStatsDeletedSuccessfullyDescriptio: The player stats have been successfully deleted.
plugins.confirmResetAll: Are you sure you want to reset ALL player stats? This will set all kills, deaths, etc. to zero but keep the players in the database.
plugins.playerStatsResetSuccessfully: All player stats have been reset successfully
plugins.confirmDeleteAll: Are you sure you want to delete ALL player stats? This action cannot be undone.
plugins.failedToDeleteAllPlayerStats: Failed to delete all player stats
plugins.noPlayerStatsAvailableDescription: No player statistics have been recorded for this server yet.

claimServer.title: Claim Server Ownership
claimServer.instructions: To verify you own this server, you need to temporarily rename it to exactly
claimServer.step1: Change your server's hostname to exactly
claimServer.step2: Make sure your server is online and accessible
claimServer.step4: After claiming, you can change the name back
claimServer.customizationInfo: Once claimed, you'll be able to customize your server listing and connect it to your community.
claimServer.ownershipChange: If this server was previously claimed by someone else, you will become the new owner.

playerStats.statsNotEnabled: Stats recording needs to be configured on this server to view player statistics.
